00002 /*
00003  *     xDMS  v1.3  -  Portable DMS archive unpacker  -  Public Domain
00004  *     Written by     Andre Rodrigues de la Rocha  <adlroc@usa.net>
00005  *
00006  *     Main decompression functions used in MEDIUM mode
00007  *
00008  */
00009 
00010 
00011 #include <string.h>
00012 
00013 #include "cdata.h"
00014 #include "u_medium.h"
00015 #include "getbits.h"
00016 #include "tables.h"
00017 
00018 
00019 #define MBITMASK 0x3fff
00020 
00021 
00022 USHORT medium_text_loc;
00023 
00024 
00025 
00026 USHORT Unpack_MEDIUM(UCHAR *in, UCHAR *out, USHORT origsize){
00027     USHORT i, j, c;
00028     UCHAR u, *outend;
00029 
00030 
00031     initbitbuf(in);
00032 
00033     outend = out+origsize;
00034     while (out < outend) {
00035         if (GETBITS(1)!=0) {
00036             DROPBITS(1);
00037             *out++ = text[medium_text_loc++ & MBITMASK] = (UCHAR)GETBITS(8);
00038             DROPBITS(8);
00039         } else {
00040             DROPBITS(1);
00041             c = GETBITS(8);  DROPBITS(8);
00042             j = (USHORT) (d_code[c]+3);
00043             u = d_len[c];
00044             c = (USHORT) (((c << u) | GETBITS(u)) & 0xff);  DROPBITS(u);
00045             u = d_len[c];
00046             c = (USHORT) ((d_code[c] << 8) | (((c << u) | GETBITS(u)) & 0xff));  DROPBITS(u);
00047             i = (USHORT) (medium_text_loc - c - 1);
00048 
00049             while(j--) *out++ = text[medium_text_loc++ & MBITMASK] = text[i++ & MBITMASK];
00050             
00051         }
00052     }
00053     medium_text_loc = (USHORT)((medium_text_loc+66) & MBITMASK);
00054 
00055     return 0;
00056 }
